hackathon-description-text: Nowadays Internet of Things (IoT) has become more and more popular with the rise of smart-home devices and Autonomous vehicles, and there are so much more possibilities awaiting. If you are interested in learning and exploring IoT, here's a great event to get your hands on.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Senior Computer System Engineer and USC EE Professor
Postdoctoral Researcher at Ming Hsieh Department of Electrical Engineering
Managing Director at Make in LA

hackathon-rules:
No actual hardware hacking and coding before the start of the event. 
No copy codes from existing project avaliable.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Drones with HD camera for all team members
Amazon Echo Dot for all team members
Bluetooth Headphones for all team members
Particle Photon for all team members
